column1:
"
Ciao, sorry to hear that your blood test results are outside the normal range. Can you please provide me with more information about your test results, such as the specific values and the normal reference range for each test? Additionally, can you tell me a little bit more about your medical history, including any medications you're currently taking and any pre-existing medical conditions you have? This information will help me better understand your situation and provide you with more tailored advice." "Ti consigliamo di consultare un medico o un professionista sanitario per una valutazione accurata e approfondita dei risultati delle tue analisi del sangue. Solo un professionista qualificato pu√≤ fornire una diagnosi e un trattamento adeguati."
